publisher.publisher-name: Institute of Computational Mathematices and Scientific/Engineering Computing(ICMSEC) Chinese Academy of Sciences

title-group.article-title: ITERATIVE METHODS WITH PRECONDITIONERS FOR INDEFINITE SYSTEMS

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1999 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: For the sparse linear equations Kx = b, where K arising from optimization and discretization of some PDEs is symmetric and indefinite, it is shown that the LLÌ…T factorization can be used to provide an "exact" preconditioner for SYMMLQ and UZAWA algorithms. "Inexact" preconditioner derived from approximate factorization is used in the numerical experiments.

ref.mixed-citation: Howard C.Elman, Multigrid and Krylov subspace methods for the discrete Stokes equations, Matrix Analysis and Parallel Computing, March 14 to 16 (1994), 151-164.

C.C. Paige, A. saunders, Solution of sparse indefinite linear equations, SIAM J. Numer. Anal., 12:4 (1975), 617-629.
Jin-xi Zhao, The generalized Cholesky factorization of symmetric indefinite matrix, Math- ematica Numerica Sinica, 18:4 (1996), 442-448.
